titleStmt.title: Here after foloweth certayne bokes, co[m]pyled by mayster Skelton, Poet Laureat whose names here after shall appere. Speke parrot The deth of the noble prince Kyng Edwarde the fourth. A treatyse of the Scottes. Ware the hawke The tunnyng of Elynour Rummynge.
Selections
titleStmt.author: Skelton, John, 1460?-1529.

editionStmt.edition: This text is an enriched version of the TCP digital transcription A18745 of text S105032 in the English Short Title Catalog (STC 5241). Textual changes and metadata enrichments aim at making the text more computationally tractable, easier to read, and suitable for network-based collaborative curation by amateur and professional end users from many walks of life. The text has been tokenized and linguistically annotated with MorphAdorner. The annotation includes standard spellings that support the display of a text in a standardized format that preserves archaic forms ('loveth', 'seekest'). Textual changes aim at restoring the text the author or stationer meant to publish.

respStmt.resp: This text has not been fully proofread

The text can be copied, modified, distributed and performed, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.
